content.rendered:
[vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” gap=”30″ content_placement=”middle” css=”.vc_custom_1622463141025{padding-top: 60px !important;padding-bottom: 60px !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/3″][ts_image animate_block=”yes” image=”433″][ts_section_title align=”center” tagline=”Investments And Properties Limited”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”2/3″][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][ts_about_text_content animate_block=”yes” animation_type=”fadeInUp”]PWAN-Prime Investments and Properties Limited is a Real Estate Marketing and Development Company; providing our clients with the best affordable real estate options (both commercial and residential properties) in Africa.

Our story is beyond what we do but about what drives us as a company. That drive is our vision to make home ownership dream a reality for as many people as possible and our mission to discover affordable lands in fast developing areas; purchase them in bulk and make them available to clients.

Since inception in 2017, that drive has built us a reputation for service delivery, developing our lands as serviced estates; providing running water;[/ts_about_text_content][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][ts_about_text_content animate_block=”yes” animation_type=”fadeInUp” animation_delay=”0.05s”]electricity; drainage; paved roads and security. Hence, the confidence that the properties we provide guarantees high return on investment.

Interestingly, we evolved from the vision of our parent body, PWAN Homes; and were incorporated on November 28, 2017. We are the sixth business office to unfold from the PWAN Group.

Our properties are spread across the federation with physical presence in Lagos State, Ogun State, Enugu State, Owerri in Imo State, Uyo in Akwa Ibom State, Calabar in Cross River State and Asaba in Delta State. Welcome to our world as our team of industrious and dedicated real estate professionals guide you through your investment journey. Cheers…[/ts_about_text_content][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1622463651613{padding-top: 60px !important;padding-bottom: 60px !important;background-color: #eb0000 !important;}” el_class=”ceo-section”][vc_column width=”1/6″][/vc_column][vc_column width=”2/3″ el_class=”aboutus”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner][ts_section_title title=”A Word From the CEO” tagline=”Obianuju Chinwuba”][ts_about_text_content animate_block=”yes” animation_type=”fadeInUp”]

It gives me great pleasure to introduce you to our illustrious organization, a leading real estate firm in Nigeria and across Africa. My name is Obianuju Chinwuba, and I am the Managing Director/CEO of PWAN-Prime Investments and Properties Limited.

As a real estate company, our commitment has been to make the dream of homeownership a reality for as many people as possible in the most transparent, honest, excellent, and accountable manner possible. We collaborate with our team to make this dream a reality because we are a brand that values teamwork and team spirit.

Our goal here is to introduce you to the best and most secure real estate investment opportunities in Nigeria. I believe that after browsing our website, you wouldn’t only have found your best investment option, but you will also have found what your loved ones are looking for and will be happy to refer them to us.

[/ts_about_text_content][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/6″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content” gap=”30″ css=”.vc_custom_1622463398946{padding-top: 60px !important;padding-bottom: 60px !important;}”][vc_column width=”2/3″][ts_section_title title=”Our Vision”][ts_about_text_content animate_block=”yes” animation_type=”fadeInUp”]MAKING HOME OWNERSHIP DREAM A REALITY….[/ts_about_text_content][vc_empty_space][ts_section_title title=”Our Mission”][ts_about_text_content animate_block=”yes” animation_type=”fadeInUp”]To discover affordable lands in fast developing areas and make these known to you. As well as, to show you how to make money towards buying land and building your own home.[/ts_about_text_content][vc_empty_space][vc_btn title=”Learn more about what we do” style=”custom” custom_background=”#3e4095″ custom_text=”#ffffff” i_align=”right” i_icon_fontawesome=”fas fa-arrow-right” add_icon=”true” link=”url:https%3A%2F%2Fpwanlekki.com%2Fwhat-we-do%2F|title:What%20We%20Do”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″][ts_section_title title=”Our Core Values” tagline=”A.R.I.S.E”][ts_about_text_content animate_block=”yes” animation_type=”fadeInUp”]

  • Accountability -Giving accounts of every bold step we make. We are accountable to you.
  • Responsibility – Constantly rising up to our obligations to serve you.
  • Integrity – Always honest and fair in all our dealings.
  • Service – Always available to attend to your needs.
  • Excellence – Delivering extremely high-quality service.

[/ts_about_text_content][/vc_column][/vc_row]
